head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SAWICKI, GLORIA M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SAWICKI, GLORIA M.

block.p: SAWICKI--Gloria M., died of cancer on July 14, 2005, Bastille Day. She was 60 years old. She received her BA and Masters degrees in French from Queens College, NY, and a DA degree in French at SUNY, Stony Brook, NY. She is survived by her mother, her husband, two sisters, one brother, five nephews and one niece.
